anime.description: With the team`s combined strength, the Sohoku High bicycle racing club beat reigning champions Hakone Academy at the Interhigh national race and achieved an impressive overall victory. Now that their hot summer has ended and third-years Kinjou, Makishima, and Tadokoro have retired from the team, first-year participants in the Interhigh Onoda Sakamichi, Imaizumi Shunsuke, and Naruko Shoukichi, along with their new captain second-year Teshima Junta and vice-captain Aoyagi Hajime begin preparing as a "new team" for their second consecutive championship at the next Interhigh. Source: crunchyroll

tag.name: shounen
tag.description: In the context of manga and associated media, shounen, literally meaning "youth" and often also specifically "boy", refers to a male audience roughly between the ages of 10 and 18. Source: Wikipedia

tag.name: target audience
tag.description: Anime, like everything else in the modern world, is targeted towards specific audiences, both implicitly by the creators and overtly by the marketing. While categories are associated with specific sex and age groups, this is not a bar on the anime being enjoyed by people who don`t fit into that band; not only do crossover titles exist, but the categories also have a considerable following outside their main demographic, and a person might as well enjoy anime from all categories. Still, does not invalidate the usefulness of marking a title as one of the categories; the same themes will likely be treated differently in anime geared for different audiences. Only one should not jump the gun and assume that a title will be more or less serious or present content in this or that way due to its target audience, or conversely assume the target audience on the content and its presentation alone. As such, the audience categories help form a broad impression of how a title might work with the announced themes, but offer little to no in-depth information about specific content or its treatment. The audience categories originate from manga magazines, which group titles of a same intended audience into a magazine that is advertised as belonging to that category, and so manga-based anime will have the category from their parent work. As for anime based on other works, the audience is often debatable, but comparing information such as time slot to the manga-based anime generally helps figure out the most likely possibility. If the parent material was classified under multiple audiences over time (for example, it was originally shounen, but then as the plot changed and became more mature, it was reclassified as seinen), and the anime adapts parent material time periods covering multiple audiences, we tag all audiences covered by the anime adaptation.

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: manga
tag.description: Manga is the lifeblood that drives the anime industry. Everything and its mother is based on manga. However! There are exceptions where the manga was not the basis for the anime. It`s common practice to make manga adaptations of many popular anime, there`s a manga based on Evangelion, and two (one shounen and one shoujo) based on each of Escaflowne and Mahou Tsukai Tai. Also it`s quite common to release manga and anime versions of a story in parallel, for instance Nadesico and Shoujo Kakumei Utena. There are also cases where an anime continues in a manga, as in the case of Angel Beats! and Angel Beats: Heaven`s Door, or reverse. See also http://anidb.net/t6493 [manhua] and http://anidb.net/t5010 [manhwa].

episode.title: 峰ヶ山で一番速い男
The Fastest Man on Minegayama
Minegayama de Ichiban Hayai Otoko
episode.summary: Feeling the passionate waves of Teshima`s ride of the soul during the Minegayama Hill Climb, Sakamichi rides all out to catch up to Ashikiba! Who will win the race...?! After the race, Ashikiba meets with third-year Fukutomi. He has his own past... Later, Tadokoro starts his last race, the Bay Coast Criterium. A three-way race between keepers of the Sohoku sprinter`s spirit, Tadokoro, Naruko, and Aoyagi begins! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 手嶋, 魂の走り
Teshima`s Ride of the Soul
Teshima, Tamashii no Hashiri
episode.summary: Sohoku`s Sakamichi, Imaizumi, and Teshima participate in the fall Minegayama Hill Climb. As the general classification winner of the Inter-High, all eyes are on Sakamichi, but unable to pull himself out of his slump, he is overcome with uncertainty. Meanwhile, Hakone Academy has sent their second-year Ashikiba Takuto. As Ashikiba overwhelms the other riders with his "Metronome Dancing" that makes use of his towering 202 centimeters, Sohoku`s new captain Teshima takes him on with his souful riding! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 牧島が残したもの
What Makishima Left Behind
Makishima ga Nokoshita Mono
episode.summary: Sakamichi is unable to recover from the shock of Makishima leaving the club to the go England before graduation. Meanwhile, in order to reclaim their crown, Hakone Academy`s new team also begins preparing. Among them is a new team member... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 最後の峰ヶ山
The Last Minegayama
Saigo no Minegayama
episode.summary: The Sohoku High School Bicycle Racing Club has concluded their fierce battle at the Inter-High. First year Onoda Sakamichi and his classmates Imaizumi and Naruko switch to new bikes and are preparing for new battles on a team without the third-years. Sohoku`s new captain Teshima and his friend Aoyagi also begin working towards a second consecutive championship. As they prepare, Sakamichi`s idol Makishima has some words for him... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ゴールライン
Finish Line
Goal Line
episode.summary: At the Hakone ACademy send-off race, Izumida shows Shinkai how much he has grown. As they enter the mountain stage, Toudou and Manami`s climbing race begins, and Toudou begins talking to Manami... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 最後の走行会
The Last Meet
Saigo no Soukoukai
episode.summary: Hakone Accademy holds its traditional fun ride to send off its third-years. In order to inherit the champions` will of Hakone Academy and overcome their idols, Izumida and the other members of the new generation go all out against the third-years! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 鳴子VS御堂筋
Naruko vs Midousuji
Naruko vs Midousuji
episode.summary: Searching for his answer to how to make Sohoku stronger, Naruko arrives in Osaka, where he`s challenged to a race by Kyoto Fushimi`s ace Midousuji for "something important." Their sprint for honor is about to begin! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 自転車異種格闘技場!!
A Different Kind of Race!!
Jitensha Ishu Kakutougijou!!
episode.summary: Fearing the team will get worse now that the third-years are gone, Imaizumi makes a shocking suggestion to Naruko in order to help the team win. After hearing his suggestion, Naruko heads back to his hometown of Osaka. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: トラブル!
Trouble!
Trouble!
episode.summary: Believing he`ll ride as the ace in the Chiba qualifiers for the Inter-High, Kaburagi is eagerly anticipating the race, but he`s hit by one accident after another. Will Sohoku High School be able to ride in the Inter-High...?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 決着
Conclusion
Kecchaku
episode.summary: Having caught up to Kaburagi and Danchiku through his synchronized riding with his younger brother Sadatoki, the first-year welcoming race comes down to a sprint to the finish between favorites Kaburagi and Danchiku and Sugimoto! Who will win the race...?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 杉元兄弟の絆
The Sugimoto Brothers` Bond
Sugimoto Kyoudai no Kizuna
episode.summary: The first-year race has started. Sugimoto, whose goal is to become the sixth regular, rides among them. However, first-year duo Kaburagi and Danchiku show off their awesome speed... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 新生総北, 始動!
New Sohoku, Start!
Shinsei Souhoku, Shidou!
episode.summary: Sakamichi, Imaizumi, and Naruko become second-years, and numerous new first-years join the Sohoku bicycle racing club. Among them are Kaburagi Issa and Danchiku Ryuhou, who have been riding since middle school! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 2度目のインターハイ
The Second Inter-High
Nidome no Inter-High
episode.summary: The day of the Inter-High has finally arrived! Sohoku High School is aiming for a second consecutive championship, Hakone Academy High school is looking to reclaim their throne, and Kyoto Fushimi High School is led by Midousuji as the nation`s strongest schools gather. As the race prepares to start, Kaburagi encounters a certain member of Hakone Academy High School... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 古賀のゴール
Koga`s Goal
Koga no Goal
episode.summary: The winner of the race for a spot on the Inter-High team is Teshima. The defeated Koga entrusts the other six with his passionate will. And an unexpected duo shows up at the Sohoku High School training camp... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 凡人と天才
The Ordinary Man and the Genius
Bonjin to Tensai
episode.summary: Teshima and Koga race for a spot on the Inter-High team. Koga drives Teshima into a corner with his powerful riding, but he has a past behind him. Meanwhile, Teshima desperately hangs on! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 1000km再び
1000km Again
1000km Futatabi
episode.summary: With their spot at the Inter-High secured, Sohoku High School jumps straight into their 1000 kilometer training camp from hell. The grueling practice menu leaves Kaburagi unable to hide his anxiety. And an unexpected man shows up at the training camp... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 鏑木, 全開!
Full Throttle, Kaburagi!
Kaburagi, Zenkai!
episode.summary: As Doubashi closes in from behind, Aoyagi musters his strength with a new technique, but Doubashi catches up. However, behind him is Kaburagi...! The final result will be decided! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 怪道銅橋
Road Monster Doubashi
Kaidou Doubashi
episode.summary: The sprint battle between Hakone Academy High School`s Road Monster Doubashi and Sohoku High School`s Aoyagi and Kaburagi duo has begun. When Kaburagi performs above expectations, Doubashi also rides with emotions bared...! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ふくらむ青八木
The Swelling Aoyagi
Fukuramu Aoyagi
episode.summary: The Inter-High has begun! The first target in each team`s sights is the sprinters` first result. Hakone Academy High School sends Doubashi, the Monster of the Road, while Aoyagi and Kaburagi represent Sohoku High School! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: スタート!!!
Start!!!
Start!!!
episode.summary: Just before the race starts, Midousuji hastily adds Kishigami Komari to the Kyoto Fushimi High School team. Kishigami approaches Imaizumi, and... Meanwhile, the identity of the sixth member of Hakone Academy High School is revealed! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 空を仰ぐ
Look up at the Sky
Sora o Aogu
episode.summary: The mountain result line is just ahead. As Manami rides all out and Teshima rides at his limit, Manami suddenly has mechanical problems! Teshima pedals as hard as he can! Who will win the first day`s mountain stage?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 雑草の走り
The Ride of Weeds
Zassou no Hashiri
episode.summary: Teshima desperately races up Irohazaka in pursuit of Manami, who`s aiming for the mountain result. Manami is disinterested in Teshima`s orindary riding, while Teshima tenaciously hangs on. When Manami responds to Teshima`s passion... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 坂道, 追撃
Sakamichi`s Pursuit
Sakamichi, Tsuigeki
episode.summary: Sakamichi is absorbed by the pack, but in order to save Teshima and his team, he begins to accelerate as he sings his favorite anime song! However, Kyoto Fushimi High School`s Midousuji stands in his way, and...?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ゼッケン1のプレッシャー
The Pressure of Tag #1
Zekken 1 no Pressure
episode.summary: When Sakamichi is swallowed by the pack and kept in check by the other teams, he can`t move or act. As the leaders enter the mountain stage, Hakone Academy High School`s Manami jumps ahead of the group, while Sohoku High School sends him...?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 箱根学園, 動く!
Hakone Academy High School Makes Its Move!
Hakone Gakuen, Ugoku!
episode.summary: Doubashi wins the first result, and Hakone Academy High School makes its first move. As Hakone Academy High School attempts to pull ahead, Sohoku High School desperately holds on. That`s when they`re struck by Hakone Academy High School`s strategy... Source: crunchyroll
